column4: Valeant meltdown puts spotlight on big mutual fund bets
column5: By Ross Kerber     BOSTON  Nov 9 Mutual fund Sequoia's loss on Valeant Pharmaceuticals International underscores the danger of placing a big bet on an individual stock.
